name: Happiny
author: Eri Yamaki
flavor_text: Usually it’s a well-behaved Pokémon, but if you take its round rock away, it will cry and fuss and throw a big old tantrum.

abilities.name: Playhouse Heal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, heal 60 damage from 1 of your Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.
